short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Binge Away on Netflix, Prime, Disney+ Hotstar, Youtube (Auto clicks annoying buttons like Next Episode, Skip Recap etc.)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Binge watch your favorite shows hassle free. This extension auto clicks the annoying buttons that hinder your binge progress. Enable the features you want the extension to handle by selecting them on the Extension's icon. And then just Sit Back, Relax, and Enjoy! Happy Binging!
